panels.description: Result of querying the bird socket
panels.title: Bird Socket

targets.expr:
(sum(bird_protocol_prefix_preferred_count{proto="BGP", instance="$instance:9324", ip_version="$version", name=~"iBGP.*"})
/ 
sum(bird_protocol_prefix_preferred_count{proto="BGP", instance="$instance:9324", ip_version="$version", name!~"iBGP.*"})
) * 100
